bibl.title: Isis Néphersès.
Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part I
bibl.author: BRICAULT, Laurent

bibl.note: S'appuie en partie sur des papyrus et des inscriptions grecques.

Willy CLARYSSE, Antoon SCHOORS and Harco WILLEMS (Edd.), Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part I = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 84 (Leuven, 1998) pp. 521-528.
